ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ html = java.ajax("https://read.douban.com"); eval(html.match(/Ark\.(user = \{[\s\S]+?\})/)[1]); cok = user.id??"anonymous"; t = String(java.getString("$.data")); function name(){ try { const decodedBytes = java.base64DecodeToByteArray(t); const totalLen = decodedBytes.length; const ivStart = totalLen - 16 - 13; const ivBytes = decodedBytes.slice(ivStart, ivStart + 16); const encryptedBytes = decodedBytes.slice(0, ivStart); const hashedKey = java.digestHex(cok, "SHA-256"); const cipher = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.hexDecodeToByteArray(hashedKey), ivBytes ); const decryptedStr = cipher.decryptStr(encryptedBytes); const jsonObj = JSON.parse(decryptedStr); result = JSON.stringify(jsonObj.posts[0].contents); } catch (e) { java.log("è§£å¯†é”™è¯¯: " + e); result = null; } return result } ddd = name(); const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); /* è§„èŒƒJsonæ•°æ® const pattern = /:"([\s\S]+?)"(,"|\}|\])/g; ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { let replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n+/g,'\\n').replace(/[\x00-\x1F\x7F]/g,''); */ var data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { const textList = item.data?.text; const process = (content) => { if (typeof content === 'string') { if(content==""){ content ="\n‎\n" } return content; } if (Array.isArray(content)) { return content.map(process).join(''); } if (content && (content.content || content.content==="")) { let c; if(content.kind == "footnote"){ if(/1/.test(sss)||/1/.test(bbb))c = "ã€*"+content.content+"ã€‘" }else{ c = content.content } return process(c); } return ''; }; return process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç« èŠ‚é€»è¾‘ if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // éå†æ•°æ®ï¼Œæå–å¹¶æ‹¼æ¥ content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // æ¯ä¸ªæ®µè½æ¢è¡Œ }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `â—ï¸åˆ·æ–°æœ¬ç« è·³è½¬åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶ç•Œé¢â—ï¸\nä¹¦åï¼š${bookName}\nä½œè€…ï¼š${bookAuthor}\n\nç®€ä»‹ï¼š\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, ã€Š${bookName}ã€‹åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶

è·³è½¬åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶

ç®€ä»‹ï¼š${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"ã€Š"+bookName+"ã€‹") } } result

ruleExplore.author: class.author@text||$.author[0].name||$.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/finalized/.test(baseUrl)){
	workid = String(java.getString("$.list[1].data.todayWorksIds[*]")).split("
");
	
	body = {
  "variables": {
    "worksIds": workid
  },
  "query": "
          query getWorksList($worksIds: [ID!]) {
            worksList(worksIds: $worksIds) {
              
                  id
                  
    id
    isOrigin
    isEssay
    
    title
    cover(useSmall: false)
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel(preferVip: false)
  
    
  url
  title

    
  author {
    name
    url
  }
  origAuthor {
    name
    url
  }
  translator {
    name
    url
  }

    
  abstract
  authorHighlight
  editorHighlight

    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      inLibraryCount
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
    isColumn
    isFinished
  
  
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks @include(if: false) {
      
    ... on EbookWorks {
      book {
        url
        averageRating
        ratingCount
      }
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        tags {
          id
          name
          url
        }
      }
    }
  
    
  ... on WorksBase {
    copyrightInfo {
      newlyAdapted
      newlyPublished
      adaptedName
      publishedName
    }
  }

    
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        fandoms {
          title
          url
        }
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        kudoCount
      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}
headers={}

function getFree(headers){
	url = "https://read.douban.com/j/graphql",
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":body
		}
		if(headers)option["headers"]=headers;
		url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option)
   return	java.ajax(url);
}
result = getFree(headers);
if(/ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€å¼‚å¸¸/.test(result)){
	x = result.match(/Ark.CSRF_TOKEN = '([^']+)'/)[1];
	headers["x-csrf-token"] = x;
	result = getFree(headers);
	}
	}
	result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList: result = java.getElements("@class.story-item@a||class.ebook-list@li"); if(!result.length){ result = java.getElements("$.list[*]") } if(result.length===0){ java.setContent('æš‚æ— ç›®å½•'); result = java.getElements("@@tag.a") } result;
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";

id="{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/\d+\/toc\/(\d+)/)[1]:"";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+(id!=""?id:aid)+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
	}else{
		result = java.getString("@tag.a.0@href")
		}
</js>
